source: その件、もう一度確認する。

casual_25.new_translation: I'm gonna check on that again.

casual_50.new_translation: I'm going to check on that again.

casual_75.new_translation: I'm gonna check on that again.

polite_25.new_translation: I shall confirm that matter once again.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 改めてその件を確認いたします。

polite_50.reverse_translation: その件を再度確認いたします。

polite_75.reverse_translation: その件を再度確認いたします

polite_100.new_translation: I shall most certainly reconfirm that matter.
polite_100.reverse_translation: その件を再度確認させていただきます。

business_25.new_translation: I will verify that matter again.

business_75.new_translation: I shall verify that matter again.

business_100.new_translation: I will thoroughly verify that matter again.
business_100.reverse_translation: 再度、その件を徹底的に確認いたします。

source: 今日ちょっといいニュースあった。
seed: I had some good news today.

casual_25.new_translation: I got some good news today
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースがあった

casual_50.new_translation: I had a great day today, I got some awesome news!
casual_50.reverse_translation: 今日はいいニュースがあった

casual_75.new_translation: What a day, I just got the best news ever!
casual_75.reverse_translation: なんて日だ、最高のニュースを聞いたよ！

casual_100.new_translation: Man, today is lit! I just got the most epic news ever!
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日は最高の日だ！最高のニュースを手に入れた！

polite_25.new_translation: I had the pleasure of receiving some good news today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースがいくつかありました。

polite_50.new_translation: It was my pleasure to receive some good news today.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースを頂戴できて光栄でした。

polite_75.new_translation: I was delighted to receive some good news today.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日、嬉しいニュースを受け取ることができてよかったです。

polite_100.new_translation: It is with utmost pleasure that I had the honor of receiving some good news today.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日、嬉しいニュースを頂戴できて大変光栄に存じます。

business_25.new_translation: I had some positive news today.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースがいくつかありました

business_50.new_translation: I received some favorable news today.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日、好ましいニュースを受けました。

business_75.new_translation: I am pleased to report that I received some favorable news today.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日、好ましいニュースを受け取りました。

business_100.new_translation: It is my pleasure to inform you that I have received some favorable news today.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日、好ましいニュースを受け取ったことをご報告いたします。

source: それって別の方法もあるよね。
seed: There might be another way, right?

casual_25.reverse_translation: 別の方法があるかもしれませんね

casual_50.reverse_translation: どうかな、別の方法があるかもしれない

casual_75.reverse_translation: 他に方法があるのかもしれない

casual_100.new_translation: Is there like, another way or something?
casual_100.reverse_translation: 他に方法とかってある？

polite_25.new_translation: Perhaps there's another way, isn't there?
polite_25.reverse_translation: もしかしたら別の方法があるかもしれませんね

polite_50.new_translation: Might there be another way, isn't there?
polite_50.reverse_translation: もしかしたら別の方法があるのではないですか？

polite_75.new_translation: Could there possibly be another way, could there?
polite_75.reverse_translation: 他に方法があるかもしれませんね

polite_100.new_translation: Might there be yet another possible alternative, I wonder?
polite_100.reverse_translation: 他に方法があるかもしれないかしら

business_25.new_translation: It's possible that there's another way, isn't it?
business_25.reverse_translation: もしかしたら別の方法があるかもしれませんね

business_50.new_translation: It is possible that an alternative approach exists, is that not the case?
business_50.reverse_translation: 別の方法があるかもしれないですね

business_75.new_translation: Might there be an alternative approach, don't you think?
business_75.reverse_translation: 別のアプローチがあるかもしれませんね

business_100.new_translation: Could there potentially be an alternative approach, wouldn't you agree?
business_100.reverse_translation: 別のアプローチが考えられるのではないでしょうか

source: ごめん、言い過ぎたかも。
seed: Sorry, I might have said too much.

casual_25.new_translation: Apologies, I might have said too much.
casual_25.reverse_translation: すみません、言い過ぎたかもしれません。

casual_50.new_translation: My bad, I might've said too much.
casual_50.reverse_translation: すみません、言い過ぎたかもしれません。

casual_75.new_translation: My bad, I mighta said too much.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 私のせい、もしかしたら言い過ぎたかも。

casual_100.new_translation: My bad, I might've gone overboard.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 俺のせい、もしかしたら言い過ぎたかも

polite_25.new_translation: I apologize, I may have said too much.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 申し訳ありません、言い過ぎたかもしれません。

polite_50.new_translation: I offer my sincerest apologies, as I may have spoken excessively.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 言い過ぎたかもしれません、誠に申し訳ございません。

polite_75.new_translation: I extend my most sincere apologies for possibly having spoken too much.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 言い過ぎたかもしれませんので、深く反省しております。

polite_100.new_translation: I offer my deepest apologies for having possibly spoken excessively.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 失礼があったかもしれません。深く反省しております。

business_25.new_translation: I apologize, I may have said too much.
business_25.reverse_translation: 申し訳ありませんが、言い過ぎたかもしれません。

business_50.new_translation: I apologize for possibly having said too much.
business_50.reverse_translation: 謝罪します。言い過ぎたかもしれません。

business_75.new_translation: I do apologize for having possibly said too much.
business_75.reverse_translation: 言い過ぎたかもしれませんことを深くお詫び申し上げます。

business_100.new_translation: I extend my sincerest apologies for potentially having overspoken.
business_100.reverse_translation: 失礼な発言をしてしまったかもしれません、深く反省しております。

source: もし時間あったら、相談したい。
seed: If I have time, I'd like to consult with you.

casual_25.new_translation: If you've got time, I'd like to chat with you about something.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、ちょっと相談したいことがあるんだけど。

casual_50.new_translation: If you've got a minute, could we touch base about something?
casual_50.reverse_translation: 時間があったら、何かについて話したいんだけど。

casual_75.new_translation: Hey, wanna chat about something if you've got a sec?
casual_75.reverse_translation: ちょっとした時間に何か話したいんだけど、時間ある？

casual_100.new_translation: Yo, got a minute to talk about something?
casual_100.reverse_translation: よかったら何か話したいんだけど、時間ある？

polite_25.new_translation: May I consult with you if you have time?
polite_25.reverse_translation: お時間があれば相談させていただけませんか？

polite_50.new_translation: Could I possibly consult with you if you're available?
polite_50.reverse_translation: もしお時間があったらご相談してもよろしいでしょうか？

polite_75.new_translation: Might I have the opportunity to discuss something with you if you're available?
polite_75.reverse_translation: もしよろしければ、お時間のある時に相談させていただけませんか？

polite_100.new_translation: Might I be so fortunate as to have the opportunity to engage in a discussion with you, should your schedule permit?
polite_100.reverse_translation: もしお時間が許すようでしたら、お話しする機会をいただけないでしょうか。

business_25.new_translation: If you have time, I would appreciate the opportunity to consult with you.
business_25.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、相談させていただきたく存じます。

business_50.new_translation: If you have a moment, I'd be grateful for the chance to discuss with you.
business_50.reverse_translation: お時間があるようでしたら、お話しする機会をいただければ幸いです。

business_75.new_translation: I would be most appreciative if you could spare a moment to converse with me.
business_75.reverse_translation: お時間をいただけるようでしたら、お話しする機会をいただければ幸いです。

business_100.new_translation: I would be extremely grateful if you could devote a brief period to engage in a conversation with me.
business_100.reverse_translation: お時間をいただいてお話しできれば幸いです。
